#include<stdio.h>
#define max1 100005
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,a[max1],n,t,sum;
    sum=0;
    for(i=1;i<=max1;i++)
    {
        if(i%2)
            sum+=i;
        else
            sum-=i;
        a[i]=sum;
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%d\n",a[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
